item.title: Who Needs Rights Anyway? A Breakdown of the Supreme(ly Broken) Court
item.description: I am furious, sad, exhausted, and absolutely disgusted by the all-out war being waged against LGBTQ+ people in the United States. For the past year and a half, you may have noticed that this blog has been silent, and this is the reason: I just couldn’t.

item.title: Hey Y'all!
item.description: Welcome! I bet you’re wondering, “what is a queerbrary?” It’s a portmanteau, a combination of two words to make a new, fun word! It’s also this website. Here, I’ll be writing about queer library topics — from trending topics like trans bathroom laws and J.
